item.title: HackTheU
item.description: HackTheU HackTheU is a non-profit organization that holds annual hackathons at the University of Utah. I was part of the small team that founded the organization and ran the event. DevPost See the submissions and winners of 2016 on devpost HackTheU Website For updates on future hackathons check out our website
